DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter, prospective, observational study will evaluate the quality of life and the factors that influence the quality of life of epoetin beta [Neorecormon] in patients with renal chronic anemia, who are on dialysis. For each eligible patient data will be collected for 6 months. Target sample size is 5000-7000 patients.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Epoetin Beta [Neorecormon] to Evaluate the Quality of Life in Patients on Dialysis With Chronic Renal Anemia
DOC.criteria: Adult patients >/=18 years of age Dialysis patients with chronic renal anemia Written informed consent Red blood cell transfusion in the previous 2 months Severe neuropsychological disorder Diabetic patients with serious complications This trial is being conducted in Morocco.
